clearConversationWarning: Please be advised that by confirming this action, all messages will be deleted!

morePrompts: You can find more prompts here:

postOnShareGPT.title: Post on ShareGPT
postOnShareGPT.warning: Please be aware that by posting your conversation on ShareGPT, it will become publicly accessible and viewable to anyone. Once posted, the conversation cannot be hidden or deleted, and may be archived or shared by others. We advise you to consider carefully and avoid sharing sensitive or private information on this platform.

submitPlaceholder: Type a message or click [/] for prompts...
stopNonStreamGenerationWarning: Stopping generation is not recommended for non-stream models. Only use it if UI is stuck. Do you want to proceed?
reduceMessagesFailedImportWarning: Full import failed as the data hit the maximum storage limit. Import as much as possible?
partialImportWarning: Full import failed as not all of the expected messages were imported: {{message}}. Would you like to import anyway?
reduceMessagesSuccess: Successfully reduced messages. {{count}} messages were removed.

googleDriveSync.title: Google Drive Sync
googleDriveSync.syncToCloudError: Failed to sync to Google Drive
googleDriveSync.syncFromCloudError: Failed to sync from Google Drive
googleDriveSync.syncToCloudWarning: This will overwrite the existing sync file on Google Drive with your current local data. Continue?
googleDriveSync.syncFromCloudWarning: This will clear all local conversations and replace them with cloud data. Continue?
googleDriveSync.noFileFound: No sync file found on Google Drive
googleDriveSync.clientIdPlaceholder: Enter your Google OAuth Client ID
googleDriveSync.setupGuideTitle: ðŸ“‹ How to get a Client ID? (click to expand)
googleDriveSync.step1: Go to Google Cloud Console and create a new project.
googleDriveSync.step2: Enable the Google Drive API: APIs & Services â†’ Library â†’ search 'Google Drive API' â†’ Enable.
googleDriveSync.step3: Configure the OAuth consent screen: set to 'External', then add your Google account as a test user.
googleDriveSync.step4: Create an OAuth 2.0 Client ID: APIs & Services â†’ Credentials â†’ Create Credentials â†’ OAuth Client ID â†’ select 'Web application'.
googleDriveSync.step5: Add your site URL (e.g. http://localhost:5173) to 'Authorized JavaScript origins', then copy the Client ID.
googleDriveSync.clientIdLocalNote: Your Client ID is stored locally in this browser only.
googleDriveSync.clientIdRequired: Please enter your Google OAuth Client ID first
googleDriveSync.storageLocationHint: Sync file is saved to Google Drive's hidden Application Data folder (only accessible by this app). The filename is betterchatgpt-sync.json.
